item.title: About Cowboy And Sage
item.description: “Cowboy & Sage” is a narrative, a guide, a dialogue, and the history of an echo–the sound of the Comforter roaming the earth, crackling through the dusty alleyways, winnowing the wheat, testing for fruit. “Cowboy & Sage” is the history of a movement of which you may only have heard faint whispers in dark corners–The Echo of Christ. And you will not find the voices speaking louder. The Echo moves where you will her.
